title: Carrie Bickmore shares photo of baby daughter Adelaide trying to munch of a baguette
text:
She welcomed her third child, daughter Adelaide, ten months ago.

And The Project's Carrie Bickmore, 38, showed just how much her little one has grown up, after she uploaded an Instagram snap of Adelaide attempting to eat a baguette on Tuesday.

'Got her priorities right,' proud mother Carrie joked in the caption.

'Got her priorities right!' Carrie Bickmore, 38, shared this adorable snap of her 10-month-old daughter Adelaide attempting to munch on a baguette on Tuesday

The heartmelting snap showed the fair-haired youngster sitting on the kitchen table in her nappy while staring sweetly at the camera from behind the bread loaf.

A second snap showed Adelaide clutching onto the baguette while attempting to take a large bite from the top,

Many of Carrie's famous friends commented on the post, including Grant Denyer's wife Chezzi who wrote: 'Oh my God she is so cute!!!!!'

Yum yum! A second snap showed Adelaide clutching onto the baguette while attempting to take a large bite from the top

It comes after Carrie recently revealed how breastfeeding the bub late at night caused her to go on delirium induced shopping sprees.

In her column for Stellar, she spoke about how she wanted to lead a revolution that championed in-store shopping rather than online after her experiences.

She explained that after a long night of nursing her baby she would go on her phone the next day and mindlessly buy things.

Whoa baby! Adelaide's sweet snap comes after Carrie recently revealed how breastfeeding the bub late at night caused her to go on delirium induced shopping sprees. She said: 'I’d ordered four pairs of the same sneaker in two different sizes'

'Low and behold, in my sleep-deprived haze I’d ordered four pairs of the same sneaker in two different sizes. How? Why? Now I had to find the time to go up to the post office and return them all,' she said of one particular incident.

The news reader also recalled another instance where an Instagram ad lured her into what she thought was a great deal for swimsuits - so much so that she bought five.

'The bathers arrived and the five pairs needed to be stitched together just to cover my left breast. The bottoms were so small I had to palm them off to my 13-year-old niece.'

Carrie shares two daughters, Evie, three, and Adelaide, 10 months, with partner Chris Walker. The sisters join older brother Oliver, 10, who she had with her late husband Greg Lange.
description: She welcomed her third child, daughter Adelaide, ten months ago.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
